content: Website of Kuan ChengSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationKuan Cheng ( 程 宽 )(The website has moved to GitHub pages https://ckkcdh.github.io/ since July 2023. )I am an Assistant Professor at Peking University, Center on Frontiers of Computing Studies (CFCS).My research interests include Computational Models and Complexity Theory, Pseudorandomness and Coding Theory.I'm also interested in Machine Learning, Quantum Computing and other topics in Computer Science.Email: ckkcdh at hotmail/gmail/pku email.Office: 206-3, Courtyard No. 5, Jingyuan. (In Office every Tuesday 2pm-5pm)I'm looking for talent students interested in TCS and related areas such as Machine Learning and Quantum Computing! Please feel free to contact me.EducationPreviously I was a postdoc at The University of Texas at Austin, hosted by David Zuckerman.I achieved a PhD degree from Johns Hopkins University, Computer Science Department,advised by Xin Li.Before that I obtained a master degree from Tsinghua University and a bachelor degree from Shandong University. TeachingIntroduction to Theory of Computation, 2021 Spring.Introduction to Theory of Computation, 2022 Spring. Theory of Computation: Advanced Methods and Frontier Topics, 2022 Fall.Introduction to Theory of Computation, 2023 Spring. PublicationsAlex Block, Jeremiah Blocki, Kuan Cheng, Elena Grigorescu, Xin Li, Yu Zheng, Minshen Zhu;On Relaxed Locally Decodable Codes for Hamming and Insertion-Deletion Errors;In Computation Complexity Conference (CCC) 2023.Kuan Cheng, Zhengzhong Jin, Xin Li, Zhide Wei, Yu Zheng;Linear Insertion Deletion Codes in the High-Noise and High-Rate Regimes;In International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming (ICALP) 2023.Kuan Cheng, Shaofeng H.-C.
